name: Citronella Soy Candle
description: This citronella soy candle is infused with the oil of the citronella plant. These candles are a natural & effective way to keep pesky mosquitoes away from decks, campsites, & other outdoor areas. $10 price listing is for 1 candle. Up to 3 are currently available. They are made in 8oz jelly mason jars and come with a rustic looking screw top lid. Candle info All candles are made from 100% soy wax and cotton wicks. Each one individually crafted and hand poured. Soy is made from a renewable source and is not made from petroleum. Soy candles burn more evenly, produce less soot and burn 30% longer than paraffin candles. Soy is better for the environment and does not release toxins into the air. Soy candles burn at a much lower temperature therefore the same candle will last much longer and also decreases the risk of getting burned. An 8 oz candle will burn up to 70 hours. Tips Always burn your soy candle on a stable, heat-resistant surface. Keep burning soy candles away from drafts and vents. Burn your soy candle until it is melted completely across the top. This will help prevent your soy candle from tunneling (burning down in the center). It does not affect the quality of the candle if some wax is left on the sides. The amount will vary per fragrance and burning conditions.

name: Wilfred
description:
Wilfred is a one of a kind baby doll head filled with plaster then painted black and gold.

Perfect for spooky Halloween decorations or for everyday display.

Wilfred has friends feel free to ask about them.
